meanings.definition: A group of people who are knowledgeable about digital technology.
meanings.sent1: The digerati at the conference shared their insights on coding.
meanings.sent2: The digerati in Silicon Valley are always ahead of the latest tech trends.
meanings.sent3: The digerati had a digital-themed party with binary code decorations.
meanings.sent4: She navigated the digital world like a skilled digerati through a maze.
meanings.sent5: The digerati's expertise in digital technology was unmatched.

meanings.definition: The elite or influential individuals in the field of digital technology.
meanings.sent1: As a member of the digerati, he had access to exclusive tech events.
meanings.sent2: The digerati were invited to speak at the prestigious tech summit.
meanings.sent3: The digerati's secret meeting was held in a high-tech underground bunker.
meanings.sent4: She rose through the ranks of the digerati like a digital queen.
meanings.sent5: The digerati's power in the tech world was undeniable.
